IVerbs: 伝わる: to spread, go around
終わる: to finish, to end

TVerbs: 下げる: to lower, pull down, reduce
IVerbs: 下がる: to fall, lower, drop
曲がる: to bent, curve, turn
見つかる: to be found

TVerbs: 倒す: to throw down, knock down
IVerbs: 倒れる: to fall (to the ground), collapse

TVerbs: 撮る: to take (photo), to record (video)
IVerbs: 撮れる: to be photographed, be recorded
生まれる: to be born

TVerbs: 写す: to copy, transcribe, photograph
IVerbs: 写る: to be in a photo, be projected

TVerbs: 帰す: to let a person go back
出す: to take out, let out, put out
IVerbs: 出る: to go out, leave, depart
直る: to be fixed, be repaired
治る: to be cured, be recovered

TVerbs: 回す: to turn, rotate, spin
IVerbs: 回る: to turn, rotate, revolve, spin

TVerbs: 逃がす: to set … free, let …go
IVerbs: 逃げる: to run away, escape

TVerbs: 冷やす: to cool, to make … cold
消す: to erase, turn off
飛ばす: to fly, send (up), splash

IVerbs: 沸く: to boil, be excited

TVerbs: 起こす: to wake (up), to raise, to launch
IVerbs: 起きる: to get up, to occur
空く: to become vacant, empty
聞こえる: to be heard

TVerbs: 片づける: to put … in order, settle
IVerbs: 片づく: to be in order, be finished

TVerbs: 立てる: to set up, put up
付ける: to spread, apply, stick, attach
見る: to look (at), watch, see
寝かせる: to send … to bed
乗せる: to give a person a ride
